85 template<typename T>
86 T getSketcherGeneralParameter(const std::string& string, T defaultvalue)
87 {
88  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
89  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher/General");
90 
91  if constexpr (std::is_same_v<decltype(defaultvalue), unsigned int>) {
92  return static_cast<unsigned int>(hGrp->GetUnsigned(string.c_str(), defaultvalue));
93  }
94  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<decltype(defaultvalue), int>) {
95  return static_cast<int>(hGrp->GetInt(string.c_str(), defaultvalue));
96  }
97 }
98 
99 template<typename T>
100 T getPreferencesViewParameter(const std::string& string, T defaultvalue)
101 {
102  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
103  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/View");
104 
105  if constexpr (std::is_same_v<decltype(defaultvalue), unsigned int>) {
106  return static_cast<unsigned int>(hGrp->GetUnsigned(string.c_str(), defaultvalue));
107  }
108  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<decltype(defaultvalue), int>) {
109  return static_cast<int>(hGrp->GetInt(string.c_str(), defaultvalue));
110  }
111 }

117 ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::~ParameterObserver()
118 {

122 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::updateBoolProperty(const std::string& string,
123  App::Property* property,
124  bool defaultvalue)
125 {
126  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
127  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher/General");
128 
129  auto boolprop = static_cast<App::PropertyBool*>(property);
130  boolprop->setValue(hGrp->GetBool(string.c_str(), defaultvalue));
131 }
132 
133 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::updateColorProperty(const std::string& string,
134  App::Property* property, float r,
135  float g, float b)
136 {
137  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp =
138  App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath("User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/View");
139 
140  auto colorprop = static_cast<App::PropertyColor*>(property);
141 
142  colorprop->setValue(r, g, b);
143 
144  App::Color elementAppColor = colorprop->getValue();
145  unsigned long color = (unsigned long)(elementAppColor.getPackedValue());
146  color = hGrp->GetUnsigned(string.c_str(), color);
147  elementAppColor.setPackedValue((uint32_t)color);
148  colorprop->setValue(elementAppColor);
149 }
150 
151 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::updateGridSize(const std::string& string,
152  App::Property* property)
153 {
154  (void)property;
155  (void)string;
156 
157  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
158  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher/General");
159 
160  Client.GridSize.setValue(
161  Base::Quantity::parse(hGrp->GetGroup("GridSize")->GetASCII("GridSize", "10.0"))
162  .getValue());
163 }

165 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::updateEscapeKeyBehaviour(const std::string& string,
166  App::Property* property)
167 {

171  ParameterGrp::handle hSketch = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
172  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher");

200 
201 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::subscribeToParameters()
202 {
203  try {
204  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
205  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher/General");
206  hGrp->Attach(this);
207 
208  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp2 = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
209  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher");
210  hGrp2->Attach(this);
211 
212  ParameterGrp::handle hGrpv = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
213  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/View");
214  hGrpv->Attach(this);
215  }
216  catch (const Base::ValueError& e) {// ensure that if parameter strings are not well-formed, the
217  // exception is not propagated
218  Base::Console().DeveloperError(
219  "ViewProviderSketch", "Malformed parameter string: %s\n", e.what());
220  }
221 }
222 
223 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::unsubscribeToParameters()
224 {
225  try {
226  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
227  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher/General");
228  hGrp->Detach(this);
229 
230  ParameterGrp::handle hGrp2 = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
231  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/Mod/Sketcher");
232  hGrp2->Detach(this);
233 
234  ParameterGrp::handle hGrpv = App::GetApplication().GetParameterGroupByPath(
235  "User parameter:BaseApp/Preferences/View");
236  hGrpv->Detach(this);
237  }
238  catch (const Base::ValueError& e) {// ensure that if parameter strings are not well-formed, the
239  // exception is not propagated
240  Base::Console().DeveloperError(
241  "ViewProviderSketch", "Malformed parameter string: %s\n", e.what());
242  }
243 }
244 
245 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::initParameters()
246 {
247  // once initialize the map with the properties
248 
249  SbColor defaultGridColor(0.7f, 0.7f, 0.7f);
250  unsigned int packedDefaultGridColor = defaultGridColor.getPackedValue();
251 
252  parameterMap = {
253  {"HideDependent",
254  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
255  updateBoolProperty(string, property, true);
256  },
257  &Client.HideDependent}},
258  {"ShowLinks",
259  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
260  updateBoolProperty(string, property, true);
261  },
262  &Client.ShowLinks}},
263  {"ShowSupport",
264  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
265  updateBoolProperty(string, property, true);
266  },
267  &Client.ShowSupport}},
268  {"RestoreCamera",
269  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
270  updateBoolProperty(string, property, true);
271  },
272  &Client.RestoreCamera}},
273  {"ForceOrtho",
274  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
275  updateBoolProperty(string, property, false);
276  },
277  &Client.ForceOrtho}},
278  {"SectionView",
279  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
280  updateBoolProperty(string, property, false);
281  },
282  &Client.SectionView}},
283  {"AutoConstraints",
284  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
285  updateBoolProperty(string, property, true);
286  },
287  &Client.Autoconstraints}},
288  {"AvoidRedundantAutoconstraints",
289  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
290  updateBoolProperty(string, property, true);
291  },
292  &Client.AvoidRedundant}},
293  {"updateEscapeKeyBehaviour",
294  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
295  updateEscapeKeyBehaviour(string, property);
296  },
297  nullptr}},
298  {"AutoRecompute",
299  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
300  updateAutoRecompute(string, property);
301  },
302  nullptr}},
303  {"RecalculateInitialSolutionWhileDragging",
304  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
305  updateRecalculateInitialSolutionWhileDragging(string, property);
306  },
307  nullptr}},
308  {"GridSizePixelThreshold",
309  {[this](const std::string& string, [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
310  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, 15);
311  Client.setGridSizePixelThreshold(v);
312  },
313  nullptr}},
314  {"GridNumberSubdivision",
315  {[this](const std::string& string, [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
316  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, 10);
317  Client.setGridNumberSubdivision(v);
318  },
319  nullptr}},
320  {"GridLinePattern",
321  {[this](const std::string& string, [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
322  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, 0x0f0f);
323  Client.setGridLinePattern(v);
324  },
325  nullptr}},
326  {"GridDivLinePattern",
327  {[this](const std::string& string, [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
328  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, 0xffff);
329  Client.setGridDivLinePattern(v);
330  },
331  nullptr}},
332  {"GridLineWidth",
333  {[this](const std::string& string, [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
334  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, 1);
335  Client.setGridLineWidth(v);
336  },
337  nullptr}},
338  {"GridDivLineWidth",
339  {[this](const std::string& string, [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
340  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, 2);
341  Client.setGridDivLineWidth(v);
342  },
343  nullptr}},
344  {"GridLineColor",
345  {[this, packedDefaultGridColor](const std::string& string,
346  [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
347  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, packedDefaultGridColor);
348  auto color = App::Color(v);
349  Client.setGridLineColor(color);
350  },
351  nullptr}},
352  {"GridDivLineColor",
353  {[this, packedDefaultGridColor](const std::string& string,
354  [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
355  auto v = getSketcherGeneralParameter(string, packedDefaultGridColor);
356  auto color = App::Color(v);
357  Client.setGridDivLineColor(color);
358  },
359  nullptr}},
360  {"SegmentsPerGeometry",
361  {[this](const std::string& string,
362  [[maybe_unused]] App::Property* property) {
363  auto v = getPreferencesViewParameter(string, 50); //LINT
364  Client.viewProviderParameters.stdCountSegments = v;
365  },
366  nullptr}},
367  {"SketchEdgeColor",
368  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
369  if (Client.AutoColor.getValue()) {
370  updateColorProperty(string, property, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
371  }
372  },
373  &Client.LineColor}},
374  {"SketchVertexColor",
375  {[this](const std::string& string, App::Property* property) {
376  if (Client.AutoColor.getValue()) {
377  updateColorProperty(string, property, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
378  }
379  },
380  &Client.PointColor}},
381  };
382 
383  for (auto& val : parameterMap) {
384  auto string = val.first;
385  auto update = std::get<0>(val.second);
386  auto property = std::get<1>(val.second);
387 
388  update(string, property);
389  }
390 
391  // unsubscribed parameters which update a property on just once upon construction (and before
392  // restore if properties are being restored from a file)
393  updateBoolProperty("ShowGrid", &Client.ShowGrid, false);
394  updateBoolProperty("GridAuto", &Client.GridAuto, true);
395  updateGridSize("GridSize", &Client.GridSize);
396 }
397 
398 void ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::OnChange(Base::Subject<const char*>& rCaller,
399  const char* sReason)
400 {
401  (void)rCaller;
402 
403  updateFromParameter(sReason);
404 }
405 
406 void SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver::updateFromParameter(const char* parameter)
407 {
408  auto key = parameterMap.find(parameter);
409 
410  if (key != parameterMap.end()) {
411  auto string = key->first;
412  auto update = std::get<0>(key->second);
413  auto property = std::get<1>(key->second);
414 
415  update(string, property);
416  }
417 }

482 ViewProviderSketch::ViewProviderSketch()
483  : SelectionObserver(false)
484  , toolManager(this)
485  , Mode(STATUS_NONE)
486  , listener(nullptr)
487  , editCoinManager(nullptr)
488  , snapManager(nullptr)
489  , pObserver(std::make_unique<ViewProviderSketch::ParameterObserver>(*this))
490  , sketchHandler(nullptr)
491  , viewOrientationFactor(1)
492 {
493  PartGui::ViewProviderAttachExtension::initExtension(this);
494  PartGui::ViewProviderGridExtension::initExtension(this);
495 
496  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(Autoconstraints,
497  (true),
498  "Auto Constraints",
499  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_None),
500  "Create auto constraints");
501  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(AvoidRedundant,
502  (true),
503  "Auto Constraints",
504  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_None),
505  "Avoid redundant autoconstraint");
506  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
507  TempoVis,
508  (Py::None()),
509  "Visibility automation",
510  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
511  "Object that handles hiding and showing other objects when entering/leaving sketch.");
512  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
513  HideDependent,
514  (true),
515  "Visibility automation",
516  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
517  "If true, all objects that depend on the sketch are hidden when opening editing.");
518  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
519  ShowLinks,
520  (true),
521  "Visibility automation",
522  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
523  "If true, all objects used in links to external geometry are shown when opening sketch.");
524  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
525  ShowSupport,
526  (true),
527  "Visibility automation",
528  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
529  "If true, all objects this sketch is attached to are shown when opening sketch.");
530  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(RestoreCamera,
531  (true),
532  "Visibility automation",
533  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
534  "If true, camera position before entering sketch is remembered, and restored "
535  "after closing it.");
536  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
537  ForceOrtho,
538  (false),
539  "Visibility automation",
540  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
541  "If true, camera type will be forced to orthographic view when entering editing mode.");
542  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
543  SectionView,
544  (false),
545  "Visibility automation",
546  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
547  "If true, only objects (or part of) located behind the sketch plane are visible.");
548  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(EditingWorkbench,
549  ("SketcherWorkbench"),
550  "Visibility automation",
551  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
552  "Name of the workbench to activate when editing this sketch.");
553  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(VisualLayerList,
554  (VisualLayer()),
555  "Layers",
556  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_ReadOnly),
557  "Information about the Visual Representation of layers");
558 
559  ADD_PROPERTY_TYPE(
560  AutoColor,
561  (true),
562  "Object Style",
563  (App::PropertyType)(App::Prop_None),
564  "If true, this sketch will be colored based on user preferences. Turn it off to set color explicitly.");
565 
566  // TODO: This is part of a naive minimal implementation to substitute rendering order
567  // Three equally visual layers to enable/disable layer.
568  std::vector<VisualLayer> layers;
569  layers.emplace_back(); // Normal layer
570  layers.emplace_back(0x7E7E); // Discontinuous line layer
571  layers.emplace_back(0xFFFF, 3, false);// Hidden layer
572 
573  VisualLayerList.setValues(std::move(layers));
574 
575  // Default values that will be overridden by preferences (if existing)
576  PointSize.setValue(4);
577 
578  // visibility automation and other parameters: update parameter and property defaults to follow
579  // preferences
580  pObserver->initParameters();
581  pObserver->subscribeToParameters();
582 
583  sPixmap = "Sketcher_Sketch";
584 
585  // rubberband selection
586  rubberband = std::make_unique<Gui::Rubberband>();
587 
588  cameraSensor.setFunction(&ViewProviderSketch::camSensCB);
589 }

591 ViewProviderSketch::~ViewProviderSketch()
592 {
593  connectionToolWidget.disconnect();
594 }
595 
596 void ViewProviderSketch::slotUndoDocument(const Gui::Document& /*doc*/)
597 {
598  // Note 1: this slot is only operative during edit mode (see signal connection/disconnection)
599  // Note 2: ViewProviderSketch::UpdateData does not generate updates during undo/redo
600  // transactions as mid-transaction data may not be in a valid state (e.g. constraints
601  // may reference invalid geometry). However undo/redo notify SketchObject after the
602  // undo/redo and before this slot is called.
603  // Note 3: Note that recomputes are no longer inhibited during the call to this slot.
604  forceUpdateData();
605 }
606 
607 void ViewProviderSketch::slotRedoDocument(const Gui::Document& /*doc*/)
608 {
609  // Note 1: this slot is only operative during edit mode (see signal connection/disconnection)
610  // Note 2: ViewProviderSketch::UpdateData does not generate updates during undo/redo
611  // transactions as mid-transaction data may not be in a valid state (e.g. constraints
612  // may reference invalid geometry). However undo/redo notify SketchObject after the
613  // undo/redo and before this slot is called.
614  // Note 3: Note that recomputes are no longer inhibited during the call to this slot.
615  forceUpdateData();
616 }
617 
618 void ViewProviderSketch::forceUpdateData()
619 {
620  if (!getSketchObject()
621  ->noRecomputes) {// the sketch was already solved in SketchObject in onUndoRedoFinished
622  Gui::Command::updateActive();
623  }
624 }
625 
626 /***************************** handler management ************************************/
627 
628 void ViewProviderSketch::activateHandler(std::unique_ptr<DrawSketchHandler> newHandler)
629 {
630  assert(editCoinManager);
631  assert(!sketchHandler);
632 
633  sketchHandler = std::move(newHandler);
634  Mode = STATUS_SKETCH_UseHandler;
635  sketchHandler->activate(this);
636 
637  // make sure receiver has focus so immediately pressing Escape will be handled by
638  // ViewProviderSketch::keyPressed() and dismiss the active handler, and not the entire
639  // sketcher editor
640  ensureFocus();
641 }
642 
643 void ViewProviderSketch::deactivateHandler()
644 {
645  assert(isInEditMode());
646  if (sketchHandler) {
647  sketchHandler->deactivate();
648  sketchHandler = nullptr;
649  }
650  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
651 }
652 
654 void ViewProviderSketch::purgeHandler()
655 {
656  deactivateHandler();
657  Gui::Selection().clearSelection();
658 
659  // ensure that we are in sketch only selection mode
660  auto* view = dynamic_cast<Gui::View3DInventor*>(Gui::Application::Instance->editDocument()->getActiveView());
661 
662  if(view) {
663  Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer;
664  viewer = static_cast<Gui::View3DInventor*>(view)->getViewer();
665  viewer->setSelectionEnabled(false);
666  }
667 
668  // Give back the focus to the MDI to make sure VPSketch receive keyboard events.
669  ensureFocus();
670 }

678 void ViewProviderSketch::moveCursorToSketchPoint(Base::Vector2d point)
679 {
680 
681  SbVec3f sbpoint(point.x, point.y, 0.f);
682 
683  Gui::MDIView* mdi = this->getActiveView();
684  Gui::View3DInventor* view = qobject_cast<Gui::View3DInventor*>(mdi);
685 
686  if (!view)
687  return;
688 
689  Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer = view->getViewer();

692

694  screencoords.getValue(x, y);
695 
696  short height = viewer->getGLWidget()->height();// Coin3D origin bottom left, QT origin top left
697 
698  QPoint newPos = viewer->getGLWidget()->mapToGlobal(QPoint(x, height - y));
699 
700 
701  // QScreen *screen = view->windowHandle()->screen();
702  // QScreen *screen = QGuiApplication::primaryScreen();
703 
704  // QCursor::setPos(screen, newPos);

706 }

714 void ViewProviderSketch::preselectAtPoint(Base::Vector2d point)
715 {
716  if (Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Point && Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Edge
717  && Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Constraint && Mode != STATUS_SKETCH_Drag
718  && Mode != STATUS_SKETCH_DragConstraint
719  && Mode != STATUS_SKETCH_UseRubberBand) {
720 
721  Gui::MDIView* mdi = this->getActiveView();
722  Gui::View3DInventor* view = qobject_cast<Gui::View3DInventor*>(mdi);
723 
724  if (!view)
725  return;
726 
727  Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer = view->getViewer();
728 
729  Base::Placement Plm = getEditingPlacement();
730 
731  auto inPlacementCoords = [&Plm](const Base::Vector3d & point) {
732  Base::Vector3d pnt;
733  Plm.multVec(point, pnt);
734  return pnt;
735  };
736 
737  auto pnt = inPlacementCoords(Base::Vector3d(point.x,point.y,0));
738 
739  SbVec3f sbpoint(static_cast<float>(pnt.x), static_cast<float>(pnt.y), static_cast<float>(pnt.z));
740 
741  SbVec2s screencoords = viewer->getPointOnViewport(sbpoint);
742 
743  std::unique_ptr<SoPickedPoint> Point(this->getPointOnRay(screencoords, viewer));
744 
745  if (detectAndShowPreselection(Point.get(), screencoords) && sketchHandler) {
746  sketchHandler->applyCursor();
747  }
748  }
749 }

752 
753 bool ViewProviderSketch::keyPressed(bool pressed, int key)
754 {
755  switch (key) {
756  case SoKeyboardEvent::ESCAPE: {
757  // make the handler quit but not the edit mode
758  if (isInEditMode() && sketchHandler) {
759  sketchHandler->registerPressedKey(pressed, key); // delegate
760  return true;
761  }
762  if (isInEditMode() && !drag.DragConstraintSet.empty()) {
763  if (!pressed) {
764  drag.DragConstraintSet.clear();
765  }
766  return true;
767  }
768  if (isInEditMode() && !drag.Dragged.empty()) {
769  if (!pressed) {
770  commitDragMove(drag.xInit, drag.yInit);
771  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
772  }
773  return true;
774  }
775  if (isInEditMode()) {
776  // #0001479: 'Escape' key dismissing dialog cancels Sketch editing
777  // If we receive a button release event but not a press event before
778  // then ignore this one.
779  if (!pressed && !viewProviderParameters.buttonPress)
780  return true;
781  viewProviderParameters.buttonPress = pressed;
782 
783  // More control over Sketcher edit mode Esc key behavior
784  // https://forum.freecad.org/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=42207
785  return viewProviderParameters.handleEscapeButton;
786  }
787  return false;
788  } break;
789  default: {
790  if (isInEditMode() && sketchHandler)
791  sketchHandler->registerPressedKey(pressed, key);
792  }
793  }
794 
795  return true;// handle all other key events
796 }

800  assert(snapManager);
801  snapManager->setAngleSnapping(enable, referencePoint);
802 }

804 void ViewProviderSketch::getProjectingLine(const SbVec2s& pnt,
805  const Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer,
806  SbLine& line) const
807 {
808  const SbViewportRegion& vp = viewer->getSoRenderManager()->getViewportRegion();
809 
810  short x, y;
811  pnt.getValue(x, y);
812  SbVec2f VPsize = vp.getViewportSize();
813  float dX, dY;
814  VPsize.getValue(dX, dY);
815 
816  float fRatio = vp.getViewportAspectRatio();
817  float pX = (float)x / float(vp.getViewportSizePixels()[0]);
818  float pY = (float)y / float(vp.getViewportSizePixels()[1]);
819 
820  // now calculate the real points respecting aspect ratio information
821  //
822  if (fRatio > 1.0f) {
823  pX = (pX - 0.5f * dX) * fRatio + 0.5f * dX;
824  }
825  else if (fRatio < 1.0f) {
826  pY = (pY - 0.5f * dY) / fRatio + 0.5f * dY;
827  }
828 
829  SoCamera* pCam = viewer->getSoRenderManager()->getCamera();
830  if (!pCam)
831  return;
832  SbViewVolume vol = pCam->getViewVolume();
833 
834  vol.projectPointToLine(SbVec2f(pX, pY), line);
835 }
836 
837 Base::Placement ViewProviderSketch::getEditingPlacement() const
838 {
839  auto doc = Gui::Application::Instance->editDocument();
840  if (!doc || doc->getInEdit() != this)
841  return getSketchObject()->globalPlacement();
842 
843  // TODO: won't work if there is scale. Hmm... what to do...
844  return Base::Placement(doc->getEditingTransform());
845 }
846 
847 void ViewProviderSketch::getCoordsOnSketchPlane(const SbVec3f& point, const SbVec3f& normal,
848  double& u, double& v) const
849 {
850  // Plane form
851  Base::Vector3d R0(0, 0, 0), RN(0, 0, 1), RX(1, 0, 0), RY(0, 1, 0);
852 
853  // move to position of Sketch
854  Base::Placement Plz = getEditingPlacement();
855  R0 = Plz.getPosition();
856  Base::Rotation tmp(Plz.getRotation());
857  tmp.multVec(RN, RN);
858  tmp.multVec(RX, RX);
859  tmp.multVec(RY, RY);
860  Plz.setRotation(tmp);
861 
862  // line
863  Base::Vector3d R1(point[0], point[1], point[2]), RA(normal[0], normal[1], normal[2]);
864  if (fabs(RN * RA) < FLT_EPSILON)
865  throw Base::ZeroDivisionError("View direction is parallel to sketch plane");
866  // intersection point on plane
867  Base::Vector3d S = R1 + ((RN * (R0 - R1)) / (RN * RA)) * RA;
868 
869  // distance to x Axle of the sketch
870  S.TransformToCoordinateSystem(R0, RX, RY);
871 
872  u = S.x;
873  v = S.y;
874 }
875 
876 bool ViewProviderSketch::mouseButtonPressed(int Button, bool pressed, const SbVec2s& cursorPos,
877  const Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer)
878 {
879  assert(isInEditMode());
880 
881  // Calculate 3d point to the mouse position
882  SbLine line;
883  getProjectingLine(cursorPos, viewer, line);
884  SbVec3f point = line.getPosition();
885  SbVec3f normal = line.getDirection();
886 
887  // use scoped_ptr to make sure that instance gets deleted in all cases
888  boost::scoped_ptr<SoPickedPoint> pp(this->getPointOnRay(cursorPos, viewer));
889 
890  // Radius maximum to allow double click event
891  const int dblClickRadius = 5;
892 
893  double x, y;
894  SbVec3f pos = point;
895  if (pp) {
896  const SoDetail* detail = pp->getDetail();
897  if (detail && detail->getTypeId() == SoPointDetail::getClassTypeId()) {
898  pos = pp->getPoint();
899  }
900  }
901 
902  try {
903  getCoordsOnSketchPlane(pos, normal, x, y);
904  snapManager->snap(x, y);
905  }
906  catch (const Base::ZeroDivisionError&) {
907  return false;
908  }
909 
910  // Left Mouse button ****************************************************
911  if (Button == 1) {
912  if (pressed) {
913  // Do things depending on the mode of the user interaction
914  switch (Mode) {
915  case STATUS_NONE: {
916  bool done = false;
917  if (preselection.isPreselectPointValid()) {
918  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
919  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Point;
920  done = true;
921  }
922  else if (preselection.isPreselectCurveValid()) {
923  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
924  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Edge;
925  done = true;
926  }
927  else if (preselection.isCrossPreselected()) {
928  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
929  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Cross;
930  done = true;
931  }
932  else if (!preselection.PreselectConstraintSet.empty()) {
933  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
934  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Constraint;
935  done = true;
936  }
937 
938  // Double click events variables
939  float dci = (float)QApplication::doubleClickInterval() / 1000.0f;
940 
941  if (done
942  && SbVec2f(cursorPos - DoubleClick::prvClickPos).length() < dblClickRadius
943  && (SbTime::getTimeOfDay() - DoubleClick::prvClickTime).getValue() < dci) {
944 
945  // Double Click Event Occurred
946  editDoubleClicked();
947  // Reset Double Click Static Variables
948  DoubleClick::prvClickTime = SbTime();
949  DoubleClick::prvClickPos = SbVec2s(
950  -16000,
951  -16000);// certainly far away from any clickable place, to avoid
952  // re-trigger of double-click if next click happens fast.
953  if (Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Wire) {
954  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
955  }
956  }
957  else {
958  DoubleClick::prvClickTime = SbTime::getTimeOfDay();
959  DoubleClick::prvClickPos = cursorPos;
960  DoubleClick::prvCursorPos = cursorPos;
961  DoubleClick::newCursorPos = cursorPos;
962  if (!done)
963  Mode = STATUS_SKETCH_StartRubberBand;
964  }
965 
966  return done;
967  }
968  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseHandler:
969  return sketchHandler->pressButton(Base::Vector2d(x, y));
970  default:
971  return false;
972  }
973  }
974  else {// Button 1 released
975  // Do things depending on the mode of the user interaction
976  switch (Mode) {
977  case STATUS_SELECT_Point:
978  if (pp) {
979  // Base::Console().Log("Select Point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
980  // Do selection
981  std::stringstream ss;
982  ss << "Vertex" << preselection.getPreselectionVertexIndex();
983 
984  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, true);
985  }
986  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
987  return true;
988  case STATUS_SELECT_Edge:
989  if (pp) {
990  // Base::Console().Log("Select Point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
991  std::stringstream ss;
992  if (preselection.isEdge())
993  ss << "Edge" << preselection.getPreselectionEdgeIndex();
994  else// external geometry
995  ss << "ExternalEdge" << preselection.getPreselectionExternalEdgeIndex();
996 
997  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, true);
998  }
999  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1000  return true;
1001  case STATUS_SELECT_Cross:
1002  if (pp) {
1003  // Base::Console().Log("Select Point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1004  std::stringstream ss;
1005  switch (preselection.PreselectCross) {
1006  case Preselection::Axes::RootPoint:
1007  ss << "RootPoint";
1008  break;
1009  case Preselection::Axes::HorizontalAxis:
1010  ss << "H_Axis";
1011  break;
1012  case Preselection::Axes::VerticalAxis:
1013  ss << "V_Axis";
1014  break;
1015  default:
1016  break;
1017  }
1018 
1019  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, true);
1020  }
1021  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1022  return true;
1023  case STATUS_SELECT_Wire: {
1024  toggleWireSelelection(preselection.PreselectCurve);
1025  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1026  return true;
1027  }
1028  case STATUS_SELECT_Constraint:
1029  if (pp) {
1030  auto sels = preselection.PreselectConstraintSet;
1031  for (int id : sels) {
1032  std::stringstream ss;
1033  ss << Sketcher::PropertyConstraintList::getConstraintName(id);
1034 
1035  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, true);
1036  }
1037  }
1038  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1039  return true;
1040  case STATUS_SKETCH_Drag:
1041  commitDragMove(x, y);
1042  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1043  return true;
1044  case STATUS_SKETCH_DragConstraint:
1045  if (!drag.DragConstraintSet.empty()) {
1046  auto idset = drag.DragConstraintSet;
1047  // restore the old positions before opening the transaction and setting the new positions
1048  for (int id : idset) {
1049  moveConstraint(id, Base::Vector2d(drag.xInit, drag.yInit));
1050  }
1051 
1052  getDocument()->openCommand(QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("Command", "Drag Constraint"));
1053  std::vector<Sketcher::Constraint*> constraints = getConstraints();
1054  for (int id : idset) {
1055  Sketcher::Constraint* constr = constraints[id]->clone();
1056  moveConstraint(constr, id, Base::Vector2d(x, y));
1057  constraints[id] = constr;
1058  }
1059 
1060  Sketcher::SketchObject* obj = getSketchObject();
1061  obj->Constraints.setValues(std::move(constraints));
1062 
1063  preselection.PreselectConstraintSet = drag.DragConstraintSet;
1064  drag.DragConstraintSet.clear();
1065  getDocument()->commitCommand();
1066  tryAutoRecomputeIfNotSolve(getSketchObject());
1067  }
1068  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1069  return true;
1070  case STATUS_SKETCH_StartRubberBand:// a single click happened, so clear selection
1071  // unless user hold control.
1072  if (!(QApplication::keyboardModifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier)) {
1073  Gui::Selection().clearSelection();
1074  }
1075  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1076  return true;
1077  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseRubberBand:
1078  doBoxSelection(DoubleClick::prvCursorPos, cursorPos, viewer);
1079  rubberband->setWorking(false);
1080 
1081  // a redraw is required in order to clear the rubberband
1082  draw(true, false);
1083  const_cast<Gui::View3DInventorViewer*>(viewer)->redraw();
1084  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1085  return true;
1086  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseHandler: {
1087  sketchHandler->applyCursor();
1088  return sketchHandler->releaseButton(Base::Vector2d(x, y));
1089  }
1090  case STATUS_NONE:
1091  default:
1092  return false;
1093  }
1094  }
1095  }
1096  // Right mouse button ****************************************************
1097  else if (Button == 2) {
1098  if (pressed) {
1099  // Do things depending on the mode of the user interaction
1100  switch (Mode) {
1101  case STATUS_NONE: {
1102  if (preselection.isPreselectPointValid()) {
1103  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1104  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Point;
1105  }
1106  else if (preselection.isPreselectCurveValid()) {
1107  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1108  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Edge;
1109  }
1110  else if (preselection.isCrossPreselected()) {
1111  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1112  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Cross;
1113  }
1114  else if (!preselection.PreselectConstraintSet.empty()) {
1115  // Base::Console().Log("start dragging, point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1116  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Constraint;
1117  }
1118  }
1119  default:
1120  break;
1121  }
1122  }
1123  else if (!pressed) {
1124  switch (Mode) {
1125  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseHandler:
1126  // delegate to handler whether to quit or do otherwise
1127  sketchHandler->pressRightButton(Base::Vector2d(x, y));
1128  return true;
1129  case STATUS_NONE:
1130  generateContextMenu();
1131  return true;
1132  case STATUS_SELECT_Point:
1133  if (pp) {
1134  // Base::Console().Log("Select Point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1135  // Do selection
1136  std::stringstream ss;
1137  ss << "Vertex" << preselection.getPreselectionVertexIndex();
1138 
1139  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, false);
1140  }
1141  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1142  generateContextMenu();
1143  return true;
1144  case STATUS_SELECT_Edge:
1145  if (pp) {
1146  // Base::Console().Log("Select Point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1147  std::stringstream ss;
1148  if (preselection.isEdge()) {
1149  ss << "Edge" << preselection.getPreselectionEdgeIndex();
1150  }
1151  else { // external geometry
1152  ss << "ExternalEdge" << preselection.getPreselectionExternalEdgeIndex();
1153  }
1154 
1155  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, false);
1156  }
1157  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1158  generateContextMenu();
1159  return true;
1160  case STATUS_SELECT_Cross:
1161  if (pp) {
1162  // Base::Console().Log("Select Point:%d\n",this->DragPoint);
1163  std::stringstream ss;
1164  switch (preselection.PreselectCross) {
1165  case Preselection::Axes::RootPoint:
1166  ss << "RootPoint";
1167  break;
1168  case Preselection::Axes::HorizontalAxis:
1169  ss << "H_Axis";
1170  break;
1171  case Preselection::Axes::VerticalAxis:
1172  ss << "V_Axis";
1173  break;
1174  default:
1175  break;
1176  }
1177 
1178  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, false);
1179  }
1180  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1181  generateContextMenu();
1182  return true;
1183  case STATUS_SELECT_Constraint: {
1184  if (pp) {
1185  auto sels = preselection.PreselectConstraintSet;
1186  for (int id : sels) {
1187  std::stringstream ss;
1188  ss << Sketcher::PropertyConstraintList::getConstraintName(id);
1189 
1190  preselectToSelection(ss, pp, false);
1191  }
1192  }
1193  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1194  generateContextMenu();
1195  return true;
1196  }
1197  case STATUS_SKETCH_Drag:
1198  case STATUS_SKETCH_DragConstraint:
1199  case STATUS_SKETCH_StartRubberBand:
1200  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseRubberBand:
1201  case STATUS_SELECT_Wire:
1202  break;
1203  }
1204  }
1205  }
1206 
1207  return false;
1208 }

1224 void ViewProviderSketch::editDoubleClicked()
1225 {
1226  if (preselection.isPreselectPointValid()) {
1227  Base::Console().Log("double click point:%d\n", preselection.PreselectPoint);
1228  }
1229  else if (preselection.isPreselectCurveValid()) {
1230  // We cannot do toggleWireSelelection directly here because the released event with
1231  //STATUS_NONE return false which clears the selection.
1232  Mode = STATUS_SELECT_Wire;
1233  }
1234  else if (preselection.isCrossPreselected()) {
1235  Base::Console().Log("double click cross:%d\n",
1236  static_cast<int>(preselection.PreselectCross));
1237  }
1238  else if (!preselection.PreselectConstraintSet.empty()) {
1239  // Find the constraint
1240  const std::vector<Sketcher::Constraint*>& constrlist =
1241  getSketchObject()->Constraints.getValues();
1242 
1243  auto sels = preselection.PreselectConstraintSet;
1244  for (int id : sels) {
1245 
1246  Constraint* Constr = constrlist[id];
1247 
1248  // if its the right constraint
1249  if (Constr->isDimensional()) {
1250  Gui::Command::openCommand(
1251  QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("Command", "Modify sketch constraints"));
1252  EditDatumDialog editDatumDialog(this, id);
1253  editDatumDialog.exec();
1254  }
1255  }
1256  }
1257 }
1258 
1259 void ViewProviderSketch::toggleWireSelelection(int clickedGeoId)
1260 {
1261  Sketcher::SketchObject* obj = getSketchObject();
1262 
1263  const Part::Geometry* geo1 = obj->getGeometry(clickedGeoId);
1264  if (isPoint(*geo1) || isCircle(*geo1) || isEllipse(*geo1) || isPeriodicBSplineCurve(*geo1)) {
1265  return;
1266  }
1267 
1268  const char* type1 = (clickedGeoId >= 0) ? "Edge" : "ExternalEdge";
1269  std::stringstream ss1;
1270  ss1 << type1 << clickedGeoId + 1;
1271  bool selecting = isSelected(ss1.str());
1272 
1273  std::vector<int> connectedEdges = { clickedGeoId };
1274  bool partHasBeenAdded = true;
1275  while (partHasBeenAdded) {
1276  partHasBeenAdded = false;
1277  for (int geoId = 0; geoId <= obj->getHighestCurveIndex(); geoId++) {
1278  if (geoId == clickedGeoId || std::find(connectedEdges.begin(), connectedEdges.end(), geoId) != connectedEdges.end()) {
1279  continue;
1280  }
1281 
1282  const Part::Geometry* geo = obj->getGeometry(geoId);
1283  if (isPoint(*geo) || isCircle(*geo) || isEllipse(*geo) || isPeriodicBSplineCurve(*geo1)) {
1284  continue;
1285  }
1286 
1287  Base::Vector3d p11 = obj->getPoint(geoId, PointPos::start);
1288  Base::Vector3d p12 = obj->getPoint(geoId, PointPos::end);
1289  bool connected = false;
1290  for (auto conGeoId : connectedEdges) {
1291  Base::Vector3d p21 = obj->getPoint(conGeoId, PointPos::start);
1292  Base::Vector3d p22 = obj->getPoint(conGeoId, PointPos::end);
1293  if ((p11 - p21).Length() < Precision::Confusion()
1294  || (p11 - p22).Length() < Precision::Confusion()
1295  || (p12 - p21).Length() < Precision::Confusion()
1296  || (p12 - p22).Length() < Precision::Confusion()) {
1297  connected = true;
1298  }
1299  }
1300 
1301  if (connected) {
1302  connectedEdges.push_back(geoId);
1303  partHasBeenAdded = true;
1304  break;
1305  }
1306  }
1307  }
1308 
1309  for (auto geoId : connectedEdges) {
1310  std::stringstream ss;
1311  const char* type = (geoId >= 0) ? "Edge" : "ExternalEdge";
1312  ss << type << geoId + 1;
1313  if (!selecting && isSelected(ss.str())) {
1314  rmvSelection(ss.str());
1315  }
1316  else if (selecting && !isSelected(ss.str())) {
1317  addSelection2(ss.str());
1318  }
1319  }
1320 
1321 }
1322 
1323 bool ViewProviderSketch::mouseMove(const SbVec2s& cursorPos, Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer)
1324 {
1325  // maximum radius for mouse moves when selecting a geometry before switching to drag mode
1326  const int dragIgnoredDistance = 3;
1327 
1328  static bool selectableConstraints = true;
1329 
1330  if (Mode < STATUS_SKETCH_UseHandler) {
1331  bool tmpSelCons = QApplication::keyboardModifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier;
1332  if (tmpSelCons != !selectableConstraints) {
1333  selectableConstraints = !tmpSelCons;
1334  editCoinManager->setConstraintSelectability(selectableConstraints);
1335  }
1336  }
1337 
1338  if (!isInEditMode())
1339  return false;
1340 
1341  // ignore small moves after selection
1342  switch (Mode) {
1343  case STATUS_SELECT_Point:
1344  case STATUS_SELECT_Edge:
1345  case STATUS_SELECT_Constraint:
1346  case STATUS_SKETCH_StartRubberBand:
1347  short dx, dy;
1348  (cursorPos - DoubleClick::prvCursorPos).getValue(dx, dy);
1349  if (std::abs(dx) < dragIgnoredDistance && std::abs(dy) < dragIgnoredDistance)
1350  return false;
1351  default:
1352  break;
1353  }
1354 
1355  // Calculate 3d point to the mouse position
1356  SbLine line;
1357  getProjectingLine(cursorPos, viewer, line);
1358 
1359  double x, y;
1360  try {
1361  getCoordsOnSketchPlane(line.getPosition(), line.getDirection(), x, y);
1362  snapManager->snap(x, y);
1363  }
1364  catch (const Base::ZeroDivisionError&) {
1365  return false;
1366  }
1367 
1368  bool preselectChanged = false;
1369  if (Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Point && Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Edge
1370  && Mode != STATUS_SELECT_Constraint && Mode != STATUS_SKETCH_Drag
1371  && Mode != STATUS_SKETCH_DragConstraint && Mode != STATUS_SKETCH_UseRubberBand) {
1372 
1373  std::unique_ptr<SoPickedPoint> Point(this->getPointOnRay(cursorPos, viewer));
1374 
1375  preselectChanged = detectAndShowPreselection(Point.get(), cursorPos);
1376  }
1377 
1378  switch (Mode) {
1379  case STATUS_NONE:
1380  if (preselectChanged) {
1381  editCoinManager->drawConstraintIcons();
1382  updateColor();
1383  return true;
1384  }
1385  return false;
1386  case STATUS_SELECT_Point:
1387  if (!getSolvedSketch().hasConflicts() && preselection.isPreselectPointValid()) {
1388  int geoId;
1389  Sketcher::PointPos pos;
1390  getSketchObject()->getGeoVertexIndex(preselection.PreselectPoint, geoId, pos);
1391 
1392  initDragging(geoId, pos, viewer);
1393  }
1394  else {
1395  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1396  }
1397  resetPreselectPoint();
1398  return true;
1399  case STATUS_SELECT_Edge:
1400  if (!getSolvedSketch().hasConflicts() && preselection.isPreselectCurveValid()) {
1401  int geoId = preselection.PreselectCurve;
1402  Sketcher::PointPos pos = Sketcher::PointPos::none;
1403 
1404  initDragging(geoId, pos, viewer);
1405  }
1406  else {
1407  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1408  }
1409  resetPreselectPoint();
1410  return true;
1411  case STATUS_SELECT_Constraint:
1412  Mode = STATUS_SKETCH_DragConstraint;
1413  drag.DragConstraintSet = preselection.PreselectConstraintSet;
1414  drag.xInit = x;
1415  drag.yInit = y;
1416  resetPreselectPoint();
1417  return true;
1418  case STATUS_SKETCH_Drag: {
1419  doDragStep(x, y);
1420  return true;
1421  }
1422  case STATUS_SKETCH_DragConstraint:
1423  if (!drag.DragConstraintSet.empty()) {
1424  auto idset = drag.DragConstraintSet;
1425  for (int id : idset) {
1426  moveConstraint(id, Base::Vector2d(x, y));
1427  }
1428  }
1429  return true;
1430  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseHandler:
1431  sketchHandler->mouseMove(Base::Vector2d(x, y));
1432  if (preselectChanged) {
1433  editCoinManager->drawConstraintIcons();
1434  sketchHandler->applyCursor();
1435  updateColor();
1436  }
1437  return true;
1438  case STATUS_SKETCH_StartRubberBand: {
1439  Mode = STATUS_SKETCH_UseRubberBand;
1440  rubberband->setWorking(true);
1441  return true;
1442  }
1443  case STATUS_SKETCH_UseRubberBand: {
1444  // Here we must use the device-pixel-ratio to compute the correct y coordinate
1445  // (#0003130)
1446  qreal dpr = viewer->getGLWidget()->devicePixelRatioF();
1447  DoubleClick::newCursorPos = cursorPos;
1448  rubberband->setCoords(
1449  DoubleClick::prvCursorPos.getValue()[0],
1450  viewer->getGLWidget()->height() * dpr - DoubleClick::prvCursorPos.getValue()[1],
1451  DoubleClick::newCursorPos.getValue()[0],
1452  viewer->getGLWidget()->height() * dpr - DoubleClick::newCursorPos.getValue()[1]);
1453  viewer->redraw();
1454  return true;
1455  }
1456  default:
1457  return false;
1458  }
1459 
1460  return false;
1461 }
1462 
1463 void ViewProviderSketch::initDragging(int geoId, Sketcher::PointPos pos, Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer)
1464 {
1465  if (geoId < 0) {
1466  return; // don't drag externals
1467  }
1468 
1469  drag.reset();
1470  Mode = STATUS_SKETCH_Drag;
1471  drag.Dragged.push_back(GeoElementId(geoId, pos));
1472 
1473  // Adding selected geos that should be dragged as well.
1474  for (auto& geoIdi : selection.SelCurvSet) {
1475  if (geoIdi < 0) {
1476  continue; //skip externals
1477  }
1478 
1479  if (geoIdi == geoId) {
1480  // geoId is already added because it was the preselected.
1481  // 2 cases : either the edge was added or a point of it.
1482  // If its a point then we replace it by the edge.
1483  // If it's the edge it's replaced by itself so it's ok.
1484  drag.Dragged[0].Pos = Sketcher::PointPos::none;
1485  }
1486  else {
1487  // For group dragging, we skip the internal geos.
1488  const Part::Geometry* geo = getSketchObject()->getGeometry(geoId);
1489  if (!GeometryFacade::isInternalAligned(geo)) {
1490  drag.Dragged.push_back(GeoElementId(geoIdi));
1491  }
1492  }
1493  }
1494  for (auto& pointId : selection.SelPointSet) {
1495  int geoIdi;
1496  Sketcher::PointPos posi;
1497  getSketchObject()->getGeoVertexIndex(pointId, geoIdi, posi);
1498  if (geoIdi < 0) {
1499  continue; //skip externals
1500  }
1501 
1502  bool add = true;
1503  for (auto& pair : drag.Dragged) {
1504  int geoIdj = pair.GeoId;
1505  Sketcher::PointPos posj = pair.Pos;
1506  if (geoIdi == geoIdj && (posi == posj || posj == Sketcher::PointPos::none)) {
1507  add = false;
1508  break;
1509  }
1510  }
1511  if (add) {
1512  drag.Dragged.push_back(GeoElementId(geoIdi, posi));
1513  }
1514  }
1515 
1516  auto setRelative = [&]() {
1517  drag.relative = true;
1518 
1519  // Calculate the click position and use it as the initial point
1520  SbLine line2;
1521  getProjectingLine(DoubleClick::prvCursorPos, viewer, line2);
1522  getCoordsOnSketchPlane(
1523  line2.getPosition(), line2.getDirection(), drag.xInit, drag.yInit);
1524  snapManager->snap(drag.xInit, drag.yInit);
1525  };
1526 
1527  if (drag.Dragged.size() == 1 && pos == Sketcher::PointPos::none) {
1528  const Part::Geometry* geo = getSketchObject()->getGeometry(geoId);
1529 
1530  // BSpline Control points are edge draggable only if their radius is movable
1531  // This is because dragging gives unwanted cosmetic results due to the scale ratio.
1532  // This is an heuristic as it does not check all indirect routes.
1533  if (GeometryFacade::isInternalType(geo, InternalType::BSplineControlPoint)) {
1534  if (geo->hasExtension(Sketcher::SolverGeometryExtension::getClassTypeId())) {
1535  auto solvext =
1536  std::static_pointer_cast<const Sketcher::SolverGeometryExtension>(
1537  geo->getExtension(
1538  Sketcher::SolverGeometryExtension::getClassTypeId())
1539  .lock());
1540 
1541  // Edge parameters are Independent, so weight won't move
1542  if (solvext->getEdge() == Sketcher::SolverGeometryExtension::Independent) {
1543  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1544  return;
1545  }
1546 
1547  // The B-Spline is constrained to be non-rational (equal weights), moving
1548  // produces a bad effect because OCCT will normalize the values of the
1549  // weights.
1550  auto grp = getSolvedSketch().getDependencyGroup(geoId,
1551  Sketcher::PointPos::none);
1552 
1553  int bsplinegeoid = -1;
1554 
1555  std::vector<int> polegeoids;
1556 
1557  for (auto c : getSketchObject()->Constraints.getValues()) {
1558  if (c->Type == Sketcher::InternalAlignment
1559  && c->AlignmentType == BSplineControlPoint
1560  && c->First == geoId) {
1561 
1562  bsplinegeoid = c->Second;
1563  break;
1564  }
1565  }
1566 
1567  if (bsplinegeoid == -1) {
1568  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1569  return;
1570  }
1571 
1572  for (auto c : getSketchObject()->Constraints.getValues()) {
1573  if (c->Type == Sketcher::InternalAlignment
1574  && c->AlignmentType == BSplineControlPoint
1575  && c->Second == bsplinegeoid) {
1576 
1577  polegeoids.push_back(c->First);
1578  }
1579  }
1580 
1581  bool allingroup = true;
1582 
1583  for (auto polegeoid : polegeoids) {
1584  std::pair<int, Sketcher::PointPos> thispole =
1585  std::make_pair(polegeoid, Sketcher::PointPos::none);
1586 
1587  if (grp.find(thispole) == grp.end())// not found
1588  allingroup = false;
1589  }
1590 
1591  if (allingroup) {// it is constrained to be non-rational
1592  Mode = STATUS_NONE;
1593  return;
1594  }
1595  }
1596  }
1597 
1598  if (geo->is<Part::GeomLineSegment>() || geo->is<Part::GeomBSplineCurve>()) {
1599  setRelative();
1600  }
1601 
1602  if (geo->is<Part::GeomBSplineCurve>()) {
1603  getSketchObject()->initTemporaryBSplinePieceMove(
1604  geoId,
1605  Sketcher::PointPos::none,
1606  Base::Vector3d(drag.xInit, drag.yInit, 0.0),
1607  false);
1608  return;
1609  }
1610  }
1611  else if (drag.Dragged.size() > 1) {
1612  setRelative();
1613  }
1614 
1615  getSketchObject()->initTemporaryMove(drag.Dragged, false);
1616 }
1617 
1618 void ViewProviderSketch::doDragStep(double x, double y)
1619 {
1620  Base::Vector3d vec(x - drag.xInit, y - drag.yInit, 0);
1621 
1622  if (drag.Dragged.size() == 1) {
1623  // special single bspline point handling.
1624  Sketcher::PointPos PosId = drag.Dragged[0].Pos;
1625 
1626  if (PosId == Sketcher::PointPos::none) {
1627  int GeoId = drag.Dragged[0].GeoId;
1628  auto geo = getSketchObject()->getGeometry(GeoId);
1629  auto gf = GeometryFacade::getFacade(geo);
1630 
1631  // BSpline weights have a radius corresponding to the weight value
1632  // However, in order for them proportional to the B-Spline size,
1633  // the scenograph has a size scalefactor times the weight
1634  // This code normalizes the information sent to the solver.
1635  if (gf->getInternalType() == InternalType::BSplineControlPoint) {
1636  auto circle = static_cast<const Part::GeomCircle*>(geo);
1637  Base::Vector3d center = circle->getCenter();
1638 
1639  Base::Vector3d dir = vec - center;
1640 
1641  double scalefactor = 1.0;
1642 
1643  if (circle->hasExtension(
1644  SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension::getClassTypeId())) {
1645  auto vpext = std::static_pointer_cast<
1646  const SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension>(
1647  circle
1648  ->getExtension(SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension::
1649  getClassTypeId())
1650  .lock());
1651 
1652  scalefactor = vpext->getRepresentationFactor();
1653  }
1654 
1655  vec = center + dir / scalefactor;
1656  }
1657  }
1658  }
1659 
1660  if (getSketchObject()->moveGeometriesTemporary(drag.Dragged, vec, drag.relative) == 0) {
1661  setPositionText(Base::Vector2d(x, y));
1662  draw(true, false);
1663  }
1664 }
1665 
1666 void ViewProviderSketch::commitDragMove(double x, double y)
1667 {
1668  const char* cmdName = (drag.Dragged.size() == 1) ?
1669  (drag.Dragged[0].Pos == Sketcher::PointPos::none ?
1670  QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("Command", "Drag Curve") : QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("Command", "Drag Point"))
1671  : QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("Command", "Drag geometries");
1672 
1673  getDocument()->openCommand(cmdName);
1674 
1675  Base::Vector3d vec(x - drag.xInit, y - drag.yInit, 0);
1676 
1677  if (drag.Dragged.size() == 1) {
1678  // special single bspline point handling.
1679  Sketcher::PointPos PosId = drag.Dragged[0].Pos;
1680 
1681  if (PosId == Sketcher::PointPos::none) {
1682  int GeoId = drag.Dragged[0].GeoId;
1683  auto geo = getSketchObject()->getGeometry(GeoId);
1684  auto gf = GeometryFacade::getFacade(geo);
1685 
1686  // BSpline weights have a radius corresponding to the weight value
1687  // However, in order for them proportional to the B-Spline size,
1688  // the scenograph has a size scalefactor times the weight
1689  // This code normalizes the information sent to the solver.
1690  if (gf->getInternalType() == InternalType::BSplineControlPoint) {
1691  auto circle = static_cast<const Part::GeomCircle*>(geo);
1692  Base::Vector3d center = circle->getCenter();
1693 
1694  Base::Vector3d dir = vec - center;
1695 
1696  double scalefactor = 1.0;
1697 
1698  if (circle->hasExtension(
1699  SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension::
1700  getClassTypeId())) {
1701  auto vpext = std::static_pointer_cast<
1702  const SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension>(
1703  circle
1704  ->getExtension(
1705  SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension::
1706  getClassTypeId())
1707  .lock());
1708 
1709  scalefactor = vpext->getRepresentationFactor();
1710  }
1711 
1712  vec = center + dir / scalefactor;
1713  }
1714  }
1715  }
1716 
1717  std::stringstream cmd;
1718  cmd << "moveGeometries(";
1719  cmd << "[";
1720  for (size_t i = 0; i < drag.Dragged.size(); ++i) {
1721  if (i > 0) {
1722  cmd << ", ";
1723  }
1724  cmd << "(" << drag.Dragged[i].GeoId << ", " << static_cast<int>(drag.Dragged[i].Pos) << ")";
1725  }
1726  cmd << "], App.Vector(" << vec.x << ", " << vec.y << ", 0)";
1727 
1728  if (drag.relative) {
1729  cmd << ", True";
1730  }
1731  cmd << ")";
1732 
1733  try {
1734  Gui::cmdAppObjectArgs(getObject(), cmd.str().c_str());
1735  }
1736  catch (const Base::Exception& e) {
1737  getDocument()->abortCommand();
1738  Base::Console().DeveloperError("ViewProviderSketch", "Drag: %s\n", e.what());
1739  }
1740 
1741  getDocument()->commitCommand();
1742 
1743  tryAutoRecomputeIfNotSolve(getSketchObject());
1744  drag.reset();
1745  resetPositionText();
1746 }

1748 void ViewProviderSketch::moveConstraint(int constNum, const Base::Vector2d& toPos)
1749 {
1750  if (auto constr = getConstraint(constNum)) {
1751  moveConstraint(constr, constNum, toPos);
1752  }
1753 }
1754 
1755 void ViewProviderSketch::moveConstraint(Sketcher::Constraint* Constr, int constNum, const Base::Vector2d& toPos)
1756 {
1757  // are we in edit?
1758  if (!isInEditMode())
1759  return;
1760 
1761 #ifdef FC_DEBUG
1762  Sketcher::SketchObject* obj = getSketchObject();
1763  int intGeoCount = obj->getHighestCurveIndex() + 1;
1764  int extGeoCount = obj->getExternalGeometryCount();
1765 #endif
1766 
1767  // with memory allocation
1768  const std::vector<Part::Geometry*> geomlist = getSolvedSketch().extractGeometry(true, true);
1769 
1770  // lambda to finalize the move
1771  auto cleanAndDraw = [this, geomlist](){
1772  // delete the cloned objects
1773  for (Part::Geometry* geomPtr : geomlist) {
1774  if (geomPtr) {
1775  delete geomPtr;
1776  }
1777  }
1778 
1779  draw(true, false);
1780  };
1781 
1782 #ifdef FC_DEBUG
1783  assert(int(geomlist.size()) == extGeoCount + intGeoCount);
1784  assert((Constr->First >= -extGeoCount && Constr->First < intGeoCount)
1785  || Constr->First != GeoEnum::GeoUndef);
1786  boost::ignore_unused(intGeoCount);
1787  boost::ignore_unused(extGeoCount);
1788 #endif
1789 
1790  if (Constr->Type == Distance || Constr->Type == DistanceX || Constr->Type == DistanceY
1791  || Constr->Type == Radius || Constr->Type == Diameter || Constr->Type == Weight) {
1792 
1793  Base::Vector3d p1(0., 0., 0.), p2(0., 0., 0.);
1794  if (Constr->SecondPos != Sketcher::PointPos::none) {// point to point distance
1795  p1 = getSolvedSketch().getPoint(Constr->First, Constr->FirstPos);
1796  p2 = getSolvedSketch().getPoint(Constr->Second, Constr->SecondPos);
1797  }
1798  else if (Constr->Second != GeoEnum::GeoUndef) {
1799  p1 = getSolvedSketch().getPoint(Constr->First, Constr->FirstPos);
1800  const Part::Geometry *geo1 = GeoList::getGeometryFromGeoId (geomlist, Constr->First);
1801  const Part::Geometry *geo2 = GeoList::getGeometryFromGeoId (geomlist, Constr->Second);
1802 
1803  if (isLineSegment(*geo2)) {
1804  if (isCircleOrArc(*geo1) && Constr->FirstPos == Sketcher::PointPos::none){
1805  std::swap(geo1, geo2); // see below
1806  }
1807  else {
1808  // point to line distance
1809  auto lineSeg = static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment *>(geo2); //NOLINT
1810  Base::Vector3d l2p1 = lineSeg->getStartPoint();
1811  Base::Vector3d l2p2 = lineSeg->getEndPoint();
1812  // calculate the projection of p1 onto line2
1813  p2.ProjectToLine(p1-l2p1, l2p2-l2p1);
1814  p2 += p1;
1815  }
1816  }
1817 
1818  if (isCircleOrArc(*geo2)) {
1819  if (Constr->FirstPos != Sketcher::PointPos::none){ // circular to point distance
1820  auto [rad, ct] = getRadiusCenterCircleArc(geo2);
1821 
1822  Base::Vector3d v = p1 - ct;
1823  v = v.Normalize();
1824  p2 = ct + rad * v;
1825  }
1826  else if (isCircleOrArc(*geo1)) { // circular to circular distance
1827  GetCirclesMinimalDistance(geo1, geo2, p1, p2);
1828  }
1829  else if (isLineSegment(*geo1)){ // circular to line distance
1830  auto lineSeg = static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment*>(geo1); //NOLINT
1831  Base::Vector3d l2p1 = lineSeg->getStartPoint();
1832  Base::Vector3d l2p2 = lineSeg->getEndPoint();
1833 
1834  auto [rad, ct] = getRadiusCenterCircleArc(geo2);
1835 
1836  p1.ProjectToLine(ct - l2p1, l2p2 - l2p1);// project on the line translated to origin
1837  Base::Vector3d v = p1;
1838  p1 += ct;
1839  v.Normalize();
1840  p2 = ct + v * rad;
1841  }
1842  }
1843  }
1844  else if (Constr->FirstPos != Sketcher::PointPos::none) {
1845  p2 = getSolvedSketch().getPoint(Constr->First, Constr->FirstPos);
1846  }
1847  else if (Constr->First != GeoEnum::GeoUndef) {
1848  const Part::Geometry* geo = GeoList::getGeometryFromGeoId(geomlist, Constr->First);
1849  if (geo->is<Part::GeomLineSegment>()) {
1850  const Part::GeomLineSegment* lineSeg =
1851  static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment*>(geo);
1852  p1 = lineSeg->getStartPoint();
1853  p2 = lineSeg->getEndPoint();
1854  }
1855  else if (geo->is<Part::GeomArcOfCircle>()) {
1856  auto* arc = static_cast<const Part::GeomArcOfCircle*>(geo);
1857  double radius = arc->getRadius();
1858  Base::Vector3d center = arc->getCenter();
1859  double startangle, endangle;
1860  arc->getRange(startangle, endangle, /*emulateCCW=*/true);
1861 
1862  if (Constr->Type == Distance && Constr->Second == GeoEnum::GeoUndef){
1863  //arc length
1864  Base::Vector3d dir = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0.) - arc->getCenter();
1865  Constr->LabelDistance = dir.Length();
1866 
1867  cleanAndDraw();
1868  return;
1869  }
1870  else {
1871  // radius and diameter
1872  p1 = center;
1873  double angle = Constr->LabelPosition;
1874  if (angle == 10) {
1875  angle = (startangle + endangle) / 2;
1876  }
1877  else {
1878  Base::Vector3d tmpDir = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0) - p1;
1879  angle = atan2(tmpDir.y, tmpDir.x);
1880  }
1881  if (Constr->Type == Sketcher::Diameter)
1882  p1 = center - radius * Base::Vector3d(cos(angle), sin(angle), 0.);
1883 
1884  p2 = center + radius * Base::Vector3d(cos(angle), sin(angle), 0.);
1885  }
1886  }
1887  else if (geo->is<Part::GeomCircle>()) {
1888  const Part::GeomCircle* circle = static_cast<const Part::GeomCircle*>(geo);
1889  double radius = circle->getRadius();
1890  Base::Vector3d center = circle->getCenter();
1891  p1 = center;
1892 
1893  Base::Vector3d tmpDir = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0) - p1;
1894 
1895  Base::Vector3d dir = radius * tmpDir.Normalize();
1896 
1897  if (Constr->Type == Sketcher::Diameter)
1898  p1 = center - dir;
1899 
1900  if (Constr->Type == Sketcher::Weight) {
1901 
1902  double scalefactor = 1.0;
1903 
1904  if (circle->hasExtension(
1905  SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension::getClassTypeId())) {
1906  auto vpext = std::static_pointer_cast<
1907  const SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension>(
1908  circle
1909  ->getExtension(SketcherGui::ViewProviderSketchGeometryExtension::
1910  getClassTypeId())
1911  .lock());
1912 
1913  scalefactor = vpext->getRepresentationFactor();
1914  }
1915 
1916  p2 = center + dir * scalefactor;
1917  }
1918  else
1919  p2 = center + dir;
1920  }
1921  else
1922  return;
1923  }
1924  else
1925  return;
1926  Base::Vector3d vec = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0) - p2;
1927 
1928  Base::Vector3d dir;
1929  if (Constr->Type == Distance || Constr->Type == Radius || Constr->Type == Diameter
1930  || Constr->Type == Weight)
1931  dir = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
1932  else if (Constr->Type == DistanceX)
1933  dir = Base::Vector3d((p2.x - p1.x >= FLT_EPSILON) ? 1 : -1, 0, 0);
1934  else if (Constr->Type == DistanceY)
1935  dir = Base::Vector3d(0, (p2.y - p1.y >= FLT_EPSILON) ? 1 : -1, 0);
1936 
1937  if (Constr->Type == Radius || Constr->Type == Diameter || Constr->Type == Weight) {
1938  Constr->LabelDistance = vec.x * dir.x + vec.y * dir.y;
1939  Constr->LabelPosition = atan2(dir.y, dir.x);
1940  }
1941  else {
1942  Base::Vector3d normal(-dir.y, dir.x, 0);
1943  Constr->LabelDistance = vec.x * normal.x + vec.y * normal.y;
1944  if (Constr->Type == Distance || Constr->Type == DistanceX
1945  || Constr->Type == DistanceY) {
1946  vec = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0) - (p2 + p1) / 2;
1947  Constr->LabelPosition = vec.x * dir.x + vec.y * dir.y;
1948  }
1949  }
1950  }
1951  else if (Constr->Type == Angle) {
1952  moveAngleConstraint(Constr, constNum, toPos);
1953  }
1954 
1955  cleanAndDraw();
1956 }
1957 
1958 void ViewProviderSketch::moveAngleConstraint(Sketcher::Constraint* constr, int constNum, const Base::Vector2d& toPos)
1959 {
1960  Sketcher::SketchObject* obj = getSketchObject();
1961  Base::Vector3d p0(0., 0., 0.);
1962  double factor = 0.5;
1963  if (constr->Second != GeoEnum::GeoUndef) {// line to line angle
1964  if (constr->Third == GeoEnum::GeoUndef) {// angle between two lines
1965  const Part::Geometry* geo1 = obj->getGeometry(constr->First);
1966  const Part::Geometry* geo2 = obj->getGeometry(constr->Second);
1967 
1968  if (!isLineSegment(*geo1) || !isLineSegment(*geo2)) {
1969  return;
1970  }
1971  const auto* lineSeg1 = static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment*>(geo1);
1972  const auto* lineSeg2 = static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment*>(geo2);
1973 
1974  Base::Vector2d l1[2], l2[2];
1975  l1[0] = Base::Vector2d(lineSeg1->getStartPoint().x, lineSeg1->getStartPoint().y);
1976  l1[1] = Base::Vector2d(lineSeg1->getEndPoint().x, lineSeg1->getEndPoint().y);
1977  l2[0] = Base::Vector2d(lineSeg2->getStartPoint().x, lineSeg2->getStartPoint().y);
1978  l2[1] = Base::Vector2d(lineSeg2->getEndPoint().x, lineSeg2->getEndPoint().y);
1979 
1980  // First we will check if the angle needs to be reversed to its supplementary
1981  bool flip1 = (constr->FirstPos == Sketcher::PointPos::end);
1982  bool flip2 = (constr->SecondPos == Sketcher::PointPos::end);
1983  Base::Vector2d p11 = flip1 ? l1[1] : l1[0];
1984  Base::Vector2d p12 = flip1 ? l1[0] : l1[1];
1985  Base::Vector2d p21 = flip2 ? l2[1] : l2[0];
1986  Base::Vector2d p22 = flip2 ? l2[0] : l2[1];
1987 
1988  // Get the intersection point in 2d of the two lines if possible
1989  Base::Line2d line1(p11, p12);
1990  Base::Line2d line2(p21, p22);
1991  Base::Vector2d intersection = Base::Vector2d(0., 0.);
1992  if (!line1.Intersect(line2, intersection)) {
1993  return;
1994  }
1995 
1996  Base::Vector2d dir1 = p12 - p11;
1997  Base::Vector2d dir2 = p22 - p21;
1998 
1999  Base::Vector2d ap3 = intersection + dir1 + dir2;
2000 
2001  auto isLeftOfLine = [](Base::Vector2d a, Base::Vector2d b, Base::Vector2d c) {
2002  return (b.x - a.x) * (c.y - a.y) - (b.y - a.y) * (c.x - a.x) > 0;
2003  };
2004 
2005  bool sign1 = isLeftOfLine(p11, p12, ap3);
2006  bool sign2 = isLeftOfLine(p21, p22, ap3);
2007 
2008  bool sign3 = isLeftOfLine(p11, p12, toPos);
2009  bool sign4 = isLeftOfLine(p21, p22, toPos);
2010 
2011  bool reverse = !(sign1 == sign3 && sign2 == sign4) && !(sign1 != sign3 && sign2 != sign4);
2012 
2013  if (reverse) {
2014  obj->reverseAngleConstraintToSupplementary(constr, constNum);
2015 
2016  ap3 = intersection + dir1 - dir2; //- dir2 instead of std::swap(dir1, dir2) and dir1 = -dir1
2017  sign1 = isLeftOfLine(p11, p12, ap3);
2018  sign2 = isLeftOfLine(p21, p22, ap3);
2019  }
2020 
2021  bool inverse = !(sign1 == sign3 && sign2 == sign4);
2022  if (inverse) {
2023  obj->inverseAngleConstraint(constr);
2024  }
2025 
2026  p0 = Base::Vector3d(intersection.x, intersection.y, 0.);
2027  }
2028  else {// angle-via-point
2029  Base::Vector3d p = getSolvedSketch().getPoint(constr->Third, constr->ThirdPos);
2030  p0 = Base::Vector3d(p.x, p.y, 0);
2031  Base::Vector3d dir1 = getSolvedSketch().calculateNormalAtPoint(constr->First, p.x, p.y);
2032  dir1.RotateZ(-M_PI / 2);// convert to vector of tangency by rotating
2033  Base::Vector3d dir2 = getSolvedSketch().calculateNormalAtPoint(constr->Second, p.x, p.y);
2034  dir2.RotateZ(-M_PI / 2);
2035 
2036  Base::Vector3d vec = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0) - p0;
2037  factor = factor * Base::sgn<double>((dir1 + dir2) * vec);
2038  }
2039  }
2040  else if (constr->First != GeoEnum::GeoUndef) {// line/arc angle
2041  const Part::Geometry* geo = obj->getGeometry(constr->First);
2042 
2043  if (isLineSegment(*geo)) {
2044  const auto* lineSeg = static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment*>(geo);
2045  p0 = (lineSeg->getEndPoint() + lineSeg->getStartPoint()) / 2;
2046  }
2047  else if (isArcOfCircle(*geo)) {
2048  const auto* arc = static_cast<const Part::GeomArcOfCircle*>(geo);
2049  p0 = arc->getCenter();
2050  }
2051  else {
2052  return;
2053  }
2054  }
2055  else {
2056  return;
2057  }
2058 
2059  Base::Vector3d vec = Base::Vector3d(toPos.x, toPos.y, 0) - p0;
2060  constr->LabelDistance = factor * vec.Length();
2061 }

2230 bool ViewProviderSketch::detectAndShowPreselection(SoPickedPoint* Point, const SbVec2s& cursorPos)
2231 {
2232  assert(isInEditMode());
2233 
2234  if (Point) {
2235 
2236  EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult result =
2237  editCoinManager->detectPreselection(Point, cursorPos);
2238 
2239  if (result.PointIndex != -1
2240  && result.PointIndex != preselection.PreselectPoint) {// if a new point is hit
2241  std::stringstream ss;
2242  ss << "Vertex" << result.PointIndex + 1;
2243  bool accepted =
2244  setPreselect(
2245  ss.str(), Point->getPoint()[0], Point->getPoint()[1], Point->getPoint()[2])
2246  != 0;
2247  preselection.blockedPreselection = !accepted;
2248  if (accepted) {
2249  setPreselectPoint(result.PointIndex);
2250 
2251  return true;
2252  }
2253  }
2254  else if (result.GeoIndex != -1
2255  && result.GeoIndex != preselection.PreselectCurve) {// if a new curve is hit
2256  std::stringstream ss;
2257  if (result.GeoIndex >= 0)
2258  ss << "Edge" << result.GeoIndex + 1;
2259  else// external geometry
2260  ss << "ExternalEdge"
2261  << -result.GeoIndex + Sketcher::GeoEnum::RefExt
2262  + 1;// convert index start from -3 to 1
2263  bool accepted =
2264  setPreselect(
2265  ss.str(), Point->getPoint()[0], Point->getPoint()[1], Point->getPoint()[2])
2266  != 0;
2267  preselection.blockedPreselection = !accepted;
2268  if (accepted) {
2269  resetPreselectPoint();
2270  preselection.PreselectCurve = result.GeoIndex;
2271 
2272  return true;
2273  }
2274  }
2275  else if (result.Cross != EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::None
2276  && static_cast<int>(result.Cross)
2277  != static_cast<int>(preselection.PreselectCross)) {// if a cross line is hit
2278  std::stringstream ss;
2279  switch (result.Cross) {
2280  case EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::RootPoint:
2281  ss << "RootPoint";
2282  break;
2283  case EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::HorizontalAxis:
2284  ss << "H_Axis";
2285  break;
2286  case EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::VerticalAxis:
2287  ss << "V_Axis";
2288  break;
2289  case EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::None:
2290  break;// silent warning - be explicit
2291  }
2292  bool accepted =
2293  setPreselect(
2294  ss.str(), Point->getPoint()[0], Point->getPoint()[1], Point->getPoint()[2])
2295  != 0;
2296  preselection.blockedPreselection = !accepted;
2297  if (accepted) {
2298  if (result.Cross == EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::RootPoint)
2299  setPreselectRootPoint();
2300  else
2301  resetPreselectPoint();
2302  preselection.PreselectCross =
2303  static_cast<Preselection::Axes>(static_cast<int>(result.Cross));
2304 
2305  return true;
2306  }
2307  }
2308  else if (!result.ConstrIndices.empty()
2309  && result.ConstrIndices
2310  != preselection.PreselectConstraintSet) {// if a constraint is hit
2311  bool accepted = true;
2312  for (std::set<int>::iterator it = result.ConstrIndices.begin();
2313  it != result.ConstrIndices.end();
2314  ++it) {
2315  std::stringstream ss;
2316  ss << Sketcher::PropertyConstraintList::getConstraintName(*it);
2317 
2318  accepted &=
2319  setPreselect(
2320  ss.str(), Point->getPoint()[0], Point->getPoint()[1], Point->getPoint()[2])
2321  != 0;
2322 
2323  preselection.blockedPreselection = !accepted;
2324  // TODO: Should we clear preselections that went through, if one fails?
2325  }
2326  if (accepted) {
2327  resetPreselectPoint();
2328  preselection.PreselectConstraintSet = result.ConstrIndices;
2329 
2330  return true;// Preselection changed
2331  }
2332  }
2333  else if ((result.PointIndex == -1 && result.GeoIndex == -1
2334  && result.Cross == EditModeCoinManager::PreselectionResult::Axes::None
2335  && result.ConstrIndices.empty())
2336  && (preselection.isPreselectPointValid() || preselection.isPreselectCurveValid()
2337  || preselection.isCrossPreselected()
2338  || !preselection.PreselectConstraintSet.empty()
2339  || preselection.blockedPreselection)) {
2340  // we have just left a preselection
2341  resetPreselectPoint();
2342  preselection.blockedPreselection = false;
2343 
2344  return true;
2345  }
2346  Gui::Selection().setPreselectCoord(
2347  Point->getPoint()[0], Point->getPoint()[1], Point->getPoint()[2]);
2348  }
2349  else if (preselection.isPreselectCurveValid() || preselection.isPreselectPointValid()
2350  || !preselection.PreselectConstraintSet.empty() || preselection.isCrossPreselected()
2351  || preselection.blockedPreselection) {
2352  resetPreselectPoint();
2353  preselection.blockedPreselection = false;
2354 
2355  return true;
2356  }
2357 
2358  return false;
2359 }

2361 void ViewProviderSketch::centerSelection()
2362 {
2363  Gui::MDIView* mdi = this->getActiveView();
2364  Gui::View3DInventor* view = qobject_cast<Gui::View3DInventor*>(mdi);
2365  if (!view || !isInEditMode())
2366  return;
2367 
2368  SoGroup* group = editCoinManager->getSelectedConstraints();
2369 
2370  Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer = view->getViewer();
2371  SoGetBoundingBoxAction action(viewer->getSoRenderManager()->getViewportRegion());
2372  action.apply(group);
2373  group->unref();
2374 
2375  SbBox3f box = action.getBoundingBox();
2376  if (!box.isEmpty()) {
2377  SoCamera* camera = viewer->getSoRenderManager()->getCamera();
2378  SbVec3f direction;
2379  camera->orientation.getValue().multVec(SbVec3f(0, 0, 1), direction);
2380  SbVec3f box_cnt = box.getCenter();
2381  SbVec3f cam_pos = box_cnt + camera->focalDistance.getValue() * direction;
2382  camera->position.setValue(cam_pos);
2383  }
2384 }
2385 
2386 void ViewProviderSketch::doBoxSelection(const SbVec2s& startPos, const SbVec2s& endPos,
2387  const Gui::View3DInventorViewer* viewer)
2388 {
2389  std::vector<SbVec2s> corners0;
2390  corners0.push_back(startPos);
2391  corners0.push_back(endPos);
2392  std::vector<SbVec2f> corners = viewer->getGLPolygon(corners0);
2393 
2394  // all calculations with polygon and proj are in dimensionless [0 1] screen coordinates
2395  Base::Polygon2d polygon;
2396  polygon.Add(Base::Vector2d(corners[0].getValue()[0], corners[0].getValue()[1]));
2397  polygon.Add(Base::Vector2d(corners[0].getValue()[0], corners[1].getValue()[1]));
2398  polygon.Add(Base::Vector2d(corners[1].getValue()[0], corners[1].getValue()[1]));
2399  polygon.Add(Base::Vector2d(corners[1].getValue()[0], corners[0].getValue()[1]));
2400 
2401  Gui::ViewVolumeProjection proj(viewer->getSoRenderManager()->getCamera()->getViewVolume());
2402 
2403  Sketcher::SketchObject* sketchObject = getSketchObject();
2404 
2405  Base::Placement Plm = getEditingPlacement();
2406 
2407  int intGeoCount = sketchObject->getHighestCurveIndex() + 1;
2408  int extGeoCount = sketchObject->getExternalGeometryCount();
2409 
2410  const std::vector<Part::Geometry*> geomlist =
2411  sketchObject->getCompleteGeometry();// without memory allocation
2412  assert(int(geomlist.size()) == extGeoCount + intGeoCount);
2413  assert(int(geomlist.size()) >= 2);
2414 
2415  auto inBBCoords = [&Plm, &proj](const Base::Vector3d & point) {
2416  Base::Vector3d pnt;
2417  Plm.multVec(point, pnt);
2418  return proj(pnt);
2419  };
2420 
2421  int VertexId = -1; // the loop below should be in sync with the main loop in
2422  // ViewProviderSketch::draw so that the vertex indices are calculated
2423  // correctly
2424  int GeoId = 0;
2425 
2426  bool touchMode = false;
2427  // check if selection goes from the right to the left side (for touch-selection where even
2428  // partially boxed objects get selected)
2429  if (corners[0].getValue()[0] > corners[1].getValue()[0])
2430  touchMode = true;
2431 
2432  auto selectVertex = [this](int vertexid) {
2433  std::stringstream ss;
2434  ss << "Vertex" << vertexid;
2435  addSelection2(ss.str());
2436  };
2437 
2438  auto selectEdge = [this](int edgeid) {
2439  std::stringstream ss;
2440  if (edgeid >= 0) {
2441  ss << "Edge" << edgeid;
2442  }
2443  else {
2444  ss << "ExternalEdge" << -edgeid - 1;
2445  }
2446  addSelection2(ss.str());
2447  };
2448 
2449  auto selectVertexIfInsideBox = [&polygon, &VertexId, &selectVertex](const Base::Vector3d & point) {
2450  if (polygon.Contains(Base::Vector2d(point.x, point.y))) {
2451  selectVertex( VertexId + 1);
2452  return true; // inside
2453  }
2454 
2455  return false; // outside
2456  };
2457 
2458  auto selectEdgeIfInsideBox = [&touchMode, &polygon, &GeoId, &inBBCoords, &selectEdge,
2459  numSegments = viewProviderParameters.stdCountSegments](auto geo){
2460 
2461  if constexpr (std::is_same<decltype(geo), Part::GeomBSplineCurve>::value) {
2462  numSegments *= geo->countKnots(); // one less segments than knots
2463  }
2464 
2465  double segment = (geo->getLastParameter() - geo->getFirstParameter()) / numSegments;
2466 
2467  bool bpolyInside = true;
2468 
2469  for (int i = 0; i < numSegments; i++) {
2470  Base::Vector3d pnt = geo->value(geo->getFirstParameter() + i * segment);
2471  pnt = inBBCoords(pnt);
2472  if (!polygon.Contains(Base::Vector2d(pnt.x, pnt.y))) {
2473  bpolyInside = false;
2474  if (!touchMode) {
2475  break;
2476  }
2477  }
2478  else if (touchMode) {
2479  bpolyInside = true;
2480  break;
2481  }
2482  }
2483 
2484  if (bpolyInside) {
2485  selectEdge(GeoId+1);
2486  }
2487  };
2488 
2489  for (std::vector<Part::Geometry*>::const_iterator it = geomlist.begin();
2490  it != geomlist.end() - 2;
2491  ++it, ++GeoId) {
2492 
2493  if (GeoId >= intGeoCount)
2494  GeoId = -extGeoCount;
2495 
2496  if ((*it)->is<Part::GeomPoint>()) {
2497  // ----- Check if single point lies inside box selection -----/
2498  const Part::GeomPoint* point = static_cast<const Part::GeomPoint*>(*it);
2499  Base::Vector3d pnt0 = inBBCoords(point->getPoint());
2500  VertexId++;
2501 
2502  selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt0);
2503  }
2504  else if ((*it)->is<Part::GeomLineSegment>()) {
2505  // ----- Check if line segment lies inside box selection -----/
2506  const Part::GeomLineSegment* lineSeg = static_cast<const Part::GeomLineSegment*>(*it);
2507  Base::Vector3d pnt1 = inBBCoords(lineSeg->getStartPoint());
2508  Base::Vector3d pnt2 = inBBCoords(lineSeg->getEndPoint());
2509 
2510  VertexId++;
2511  bool pnt1Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt1);
2512 
2513  VertexId++;
2514  bool pnt2Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt2);
2515  polygon.Contains(Base::Vector2d(pnt1.x, pnt1.y));
2516  polygon.Contains(Base::Vector2d(pnt2.x, pnt2.y));
2517 
2518 
2519  if ((pnt1Inside && pnt2Inside) && !touchMode) {
2520  selectEdge(GeoId+1);
2521  }
2522  // check if line intersects with polygon
2523  else if (touchMode) {
2524  Base::Polygon2d lineAsPolygon;
2525  lineAsPolygon.Add(Base::Vector2d(pnt1.x, pnt1.y));
2526  lineAsPolygon.Add(Base::Vector2d(pnt2.x, pnt2.y));
2527  std::list<Base::Polygon2d> resultList;
2528  polygon.Intersect(lineAsPolygon, resultList);
2529  if (!resultList.empty()) {
2530  selectEdge(GeoId+1);
2531  }
2532  }
2533  }
2534  else if ((*it)->isDerivedFrom<Part::GeomConic>()) {
2535  // ----- Check if circle lies inside box selection -----/
2538  const Part::GeomConic* circle = static_cast<const Part::GeomConic*>(*it);
2539  Base::Vector3d pnt0 = inBBCoords(circle->getCenter());
2540  VertexId++;
2541 
2542  bool pnt0Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt0);
2543 
2544  if (pnt0Inside || touchMode) {
2545  selectEdgeIfInsideBox(circle);
2546  }
2547  }
2548  else if ((*it)->isDerivedFrom<Part::GeomArcOfConic>()) {
2549  // Check if arc lies inside box selection
2550  const Part::GeomArcOfConic* aoc = static_cast<const Part::GeomArcOfConic*>(*it);
2551 
2552  Base::Vector3d pnt0 = inBBCoords(aoc->getStartPoint(/*emulateCCW=*/true));
2553  VertexId++;
2554  bool pnt0Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt0);
2555 
2556  Base::Vector3d pnt1 = inBBCoords(aoc->getEndPoint(/*emulateCCW=*/true));
2557  VertexId++;
2558  bool pnt1Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt1);
2559 
2560  Base::Vector3d pnt2 = inBBCoords(aoc->getCenter());
2561  VertexId++;
2562  selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt2);
2563 
2564  if ((pnt0Inside && pnt1Inside) || touchMode) {
2565  selectEdgeIfInsideBox(aoc);
2566  }
2567  }
2568  else if ((*it)->is<Part::GeomBSplineCurve>()) {
2569  const Part::GeomBSplineCurve* spline = static_cast<const Part::GeomBSplineCurve*>(*it);
2570 
2571  Base::Vector3d pnt1 = inBBCoords(spline->getStartPoint());
2572  VertexId++;
2573  bool pnt1Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt1);
2574 
2575  Base::Vector3d pnt2 = inBBCoords(spline->getEndPoint());
2576  VertexId++;
2577  bool pnt2Inside = selectVertexIfInsideBox(pnt2);
2578 
2579  if ((pnt1Inside && pnt2Inside) || touchMode) {
2580  selectEdgeIfInsideBox(spline);
2581  }
2582  }
2583  else {
2584  Base::Console().DeveloperError("ViewProviderSketch::doBoxSelection",
2585  "Geometry type is unsupported. Selection may be unsynchronised and fail.");
2586  }
2587  }
2588 
2589  Base::Vector3d pnt0 = proj(Plm.getPosition());
2590  if (polygon.Contains(Base::Vector2d(pnt0.x, pnt0.y))) {
2591  std::stringstream ss;
2592  ss << "RootPoint";
2593  addSelection2(ss.str());
2594  }
2595 }
